titleStmt.title: Tho. wyatis translatyon of Plutarckes boke, of the quyete of mynde
De tranquilitate animi. English
titleStmt.author: Plutarch.
Wyatt, Thomas, Sir, 1503?-1542.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete by Richarde Pynson, printer to the kynges moost noble gracc [sic],

notesStmt.note: A translation of: De tranquilitate animi.
Printer's name and address from colophon.
Dedication dated: the last day of Decembre. M.D.xxvij.
Identified as STC 20059+ on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
